problem.markdown:
>>Which quarter had the lowest number of deliveries?<< [[(January - March 2016), April - June 2016, July - September 2016, October - December 2016]]
[explanation] The quarter January - March 2016 had the lowest number of deliveries [explanation]
problem.p: Which quarter had the lowest number of deliveries?

optioninput.label: Which quarter had the lowest number of deliveries?

div.p: The quarter January - March 2016 had the lowest number of deliveries
